message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.CY, cs.HC 

This paper discusses the challenges encountered while productizing contextual bandits schemes in large scale settings, which involves machine learning, optimization, and human-computer interaction. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also touches upon issues related to cybersecurity (cs.CY) and human-computer interaction (cs.HC), which are less likely but still relevant sub-categories.
